channel.title: Products on Embedded Art
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Embedded Art

item.title: IOT Gateway 4G Modbus
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: IOT Gateway 4G Modbus Industrial IoT (Internet of Things) Gateway Description : Modbus RTU (RS485) to GPRS(MQTT) Gateway is Reliable, Flexible and Plug-n-play device to fetch data Over Modbus RTU and send them to cloud using MQTT protocol over GPRS Network. Device has WiFi and Bluetooth and GPS functionality. Multiple Modbus RTU transactions can be configured using SMS or From cloud to fetch data from variety of Modbus supported devices like Energymeter, Temperature scanner etc.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: Monarch Elevator Integrated Control Panel
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: Monarch Elevator Integrated Control Panel Features : Machine Room & Room-less type Enclosure. Appropriate placement of cards and components, simplified wiring for fast installation and easy maintenance & Debugging. Microcontroller based state of the art design. Optically Isolated Inputs & outputs for high reliable operation. Highly Noise Immune circuit design and stable power supply backing to withstand all type of power supply conditions. Field serviceable socket type interconnectivity & Modular PC- Boards for hassle free replacement.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: Elevator Control Panel
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: Elevator Control Panel Specification : Supply Voltage : Three Phase No of Stop: Upto G+7 Auto Door / Manual Door All Reed / Three Reed An error are display on LCD display on elevator controller. All system parameters can be adjusted by using 3 buttons and LCD placed on the card. Call Register LED and Call Push Button are on single wire. All the Input and Output are available in both 12VDC and 24VDC.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: IO Controller LAN
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: IO Controller LAN This IO Controller work as industrial PLC, this device is suitable in industrial automation We provide Custom firmware and hardware support Features : Power Supply : 24V DC LAN Supoort 8 Digital Output 8 digital input RS-485 RS-232 RTC (real time clock) 16x2 LCD Display Switch This board can also use in industrial application, as all customers requirement is different we can provide custom solution.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: GSM Controller 2G DIN Rail
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)

item.title: Home Automation 4Channel
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: Home Automation 4Channel Make Your Home Smart with Your DIY Idea We made this product to make home automation system affordable and accessible to every one. We sell this product with our default firmware which we update time to time and add more functionality.To make home automation project we provide ready made circuit and you write your code according to your ideas. You can control 4 appliances from anywhere in the world using WiFi and internet connectivity, board has also support for manual switch and infrared receiver conconnection.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: Elevator Controller
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: Elevator Controller Specification : Supply Voltage : 12VDC / 24VDC No of Stop: Upto G+7 Auto Door / Manual Door All Reed / Three Reed An error are display on LCD display. All system parameters can be adjusted by using 3 buttons and LCD placed on the card. Call Register LED and Call Push Button are on single wire. All the Input and Output are available in both 12VDC and 24VDC.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: LED Display Control Card
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: LED Display Control Card LED Display Control Card is designed to make indusrial display easily. This card is drive easily available ready made module like P10. Display data can be updated via RS-232, RS-485, or Ethernet port. Data can be read from any PLC , SCADA system, PC, or any other system and data can be display real time which make this card unique. Also data can be displayed remotely using IOT application.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar
